title: Walk Through Object
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of creating a generator function that walks through all the keys of a given object using recursion. The purpose of this lab is to provide a hands-on experience for learners to understand how to use yield and yield* expressions in combination with for...of loops and Object.keys() to iterate over object keys and their values. By the end of this lab, learners will have a practical understanding of how to recursively walk through an object and generate an array of keys representing the current path and the corresponding values.

meta.title: Recursively Explore Object Keys with Generators
meta.description: Learn how to use generator functions and yield expressions to walk through object keys recursively.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, recursion, javascript practice online, object, keys, javascript playground, javascript lab, yield, javascript tutor

verify.name: Verify Node Commands Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 遍历对象
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探讨如何创建一个生成器函数，该函数使用递归遍历给定对象的所有键。本实验的目的是为学习者提供实践经验，以了解如何将yield和yield*表达式与for...of循环和Object.keys()结合使用，以迭代对象的键及其值。在本实验结束时，学习者将实际理解如何递归地遍历对象，并生成一个表示当前路径和相应值的键数组。

meta.title: 使用生成器递归探索对象键
meta.description: 学习如何使用生成器函数和yield表达式递归地遍历对象键。
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript实践, 递归, 在线javascript实践, 对象, 键, javascript游乐场, javascript实验, yield, javascript教程

verify.name: 验证Node命令的用法
verify.hint: 在终端/SSH中，通过输入'node'并按回车键可以运行JavaScript。
